content: I answered the questions and uploaded my code but I cannot find a submit button. Thanks
subject: How to submit PS0

content: I just added you as a student, please try now.

I am a very novice of python, so I had written my code on the right side (interpreter pane), not on the left side (a Code Editor).

I talked with TA(Walter.H) this morning and it turned out to be wrong... 

In this case, should I submit the ps.0 again? 

If I submit again it late, is there any disadvantage?

Thank you :)
Just submit it again, pset0 is not for points, just making sure everything is all set up (and a learning opportunity!)
